data.name: CannotDeleteDbo
data.value: Warning! Cannot delete the user. This user is the owner of the company database!

data.name: UserCannotRevoked
data.value: Unable to remove the login of user {0} from the database

data.name: DBExist
data.value: Warning! A company named '{0}' already exists. Please choose another name for the company that you want to create.

data.name: PhysicalDBExist
data.value: Warning! A database named '{1}' already exists on server {0} and contains one or more objects; this database cannot be overwritten because you did not select the option 'Overwrite database'. You have to select this option, or modify the name of the database that you wish to create.

data.name: LoginNotExist
data.value: Warning! The user '{0}' selected as company database owner does not exist on server {1}; it cannot be created because you did not select the option 'Create login'. You have to select this option, or an already existing user.

data.name: LoginExistWithBadConnection
data.value: Warning! Unable to connect with the user specified as company database owner. Verify the user name and password.

data.name: MissingRoleForLogin
data.value: Warning! The user selected as company database owner has not enough database roles. Impossible to assign these roles because you did not select the option 'Create roles'. You have to select this option or a different user who already has these roles.

data.name: LoginAlreadyExist
data.value: Warning: the login you want to add '{0}' already exists!

data.name: StopDataBaseCreation
data.value: The database creation will be stopped!

data.name: CannotConnectWithLogin
data.value: Unable to connect with the selected login! Check the password!

data.name: UserHasNotSysAdminRole
data.value: The user has not the database role 'SysAdmin'.

data.name: SuccessGenericConnection
data.value: Connection successfully ended.

data.name: ChangePwForUserInMigrationKit
data.value: Specified user is not recognized as a database user, so it will be inserted with the password of the related application user. If you want change it, insert the new password in the proper text box.

data.name: WrongUserCredential
data.value: The credential of the user {0} are not correct, unable to continue.

data.name: DeleteDatabase
data.value: The database deletion process will be stopped!

data.name: CannotAddNTLogin
data.value: Unable to create the login (in Windows authentication mode) for user {0}

data.name: CannotAddSQLLogin
data.value: Unable to create the login (in Non-Windows authentication mode) for user {0}

data.name: CannotSettingRoleSysAdmin
data.value: Unable to set the System Administrator role for the user {0} (who is owner of the company database {1})

data.name: AbortingCompanyCreation
data.value: The creation of the company {0} is stopped!

data.name: RecordsTracedDeleated
